text: "New Rules" is a song by English singer Dua Lipa. It was recorded for her self-titled debut studio album (2017). The track was written and produced by Ian Kirkpatrick. It was additionally written by Caroline Ailin and Emily Warren. It was released on 15 July 2017 as the album's seventh single for contemporary hit radio in the United Kingdom. It was released in the United States on August 22 in the same format. ==Track listings== ==Release history== Release dates and formats for "New Rules" Region Date Format Version Label United Kingdom 15 July 2017 Contemporary hit radio Original Warner Music Italy 28 July 2017 United States 21 August 2017 Hot adult contemporary radio Warner Bros. 22 August 2017 Contemporary hit radio Various 25 August 2017 Digital download Alison Wonderland remix Warner Music 20 October 2017 Acoustic version 3 November 2017 Remixes EP Germany 17 November 2017 CD single Original Warner Bros. title: New Rules
